DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Orthopaedic Outcomes Network ( MOON ) ACL Reconstruction ( ACLR ) : 10 Year Onsite Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study identify risk factor sign symptom osteoarthritis two ten year post ACL reconstruction information available time surgery . Hypothesis : Smoking status , old age , high BMI , increase severity cartilage injury , increase meniscal resection , revision surgery , incidence additional arthroscopic procedure result symptom sign osteoarthritis 10-year follow-up . Primary outcome measure joint space width measure weight-bearing radiograph , well pain subscale Knee Injury Osteoarthritis Score ( KOOS ) . Secondary outcome measure include knee relate quality life subscale Knee Injury Osteoarthritis Score ( KOOS ) .
